text:
@albamonica @NBCNews TRUMP: “When you do testing…you’re going to find more people, you’re going to find more cases. So, slow the testing down, please."

VP Pence at Tulsa rally:
“We are one day closer to putting the coronavirus in the past.”

SEE HOW THEY DO IT.
